prompt_text: You and your friends are on your way to a concert in Dallas but come across a woman covered in blood. Do you stop to help her or keep driving?

pass.message: You stop to help the woman and offer her a ride.

prompt_text: The lady approaches you and pulls out a gun and aims it towards you. What do you do?

pass.message: You successfully persuade the lady to lower the gun. But she shoots herself.

fail.message: You get shot. The woman then proceeds to shoot herself.

prompt_text: You see a house in the distance and knock on the door, you are greeted by a woman she invites you inside but pulls out a knife. What do you do?

fail.message: You get stabbed. You are wounded. But you successfully kill the woman.

prompt_text: You find a car in the driveway and climb in it, a lady runs towards the car yelling at you with an axe in her hand. What do you do?

pass.message: You manage to get out of the car and are able to hit her with your weapon and damage her.

fail.message: The lady manages to hit your car various times, breaking your windows and injuring you in the process.
